title: How to Report a Hacker on Steam

steps.headline: Open up Steam by clicking on the steam icon in the system tray
Find the person by scrolling through the list and then select their "profile" link
Click on "report violation" in top right corner.
Describe the hacking in accurate detail.
steps.description: Watching video of the gameplay will help you describe more accurately.

text: Open up Steam by clicking on the steam icon in the system tray  Select "players"  Find the person by scrolling through the list and then select their "profile" link  Click on "report violation" in top right corner.  Describe the hacking in accurate detail. Watching video of the gameplay will help you describe more accurately.
